title: Image Classification with TensorFlow in Machine Learning
description: In this article, I am going to explain how we can train a neural network model for the task of image classification with TensorFlow. For those new to TensorFlow, TensorFlow is an end-to-end open-source platform for machine learning. It has a comprehensive and flexible ecosystem of tools, libraries, and community resources that allow researchers to push cutting-edge advancements in ML, and developers to easily build and deploy machine learning-based applications.
